page.title: 10TOURISM VISITORS
page.content: It is the beautiful surroundings and the peacefulness that attract tourists to our area.Some of them come to fish in the rivers{Iaen,Twymyn and Clegyr. Accommodation in our area is quite good.There is the Wynnstay Arms Hotel and{Barlings Barn}where there is a squash court,sauna and exercise room and some farms do bed and breakfast. There are also cottages to let and four caravan sites.Visitors go to the village workshops,an antique shop in Bontdolgadfan and{Ffrwd Fawr},a waterfall with a drop of about a hundred and twenty feet not far away at{Dylife}.There is a Llanbrynmair visitors guide booklet that is sold in the local post offices and shops.There are many footpaths on the hills roundabout which visitors walk for pleasure.
